title: Organic MACA POWDER for Flavoring Kombucha (30-40 Servings)
features: The natural benefits in the flavorings are passed on to you through your Kombucha
Maca root is a nutrient dense adaptagen that has been used to increase stamina, boost libido and combat fatigue
description: ORGANIC MACA POWDER FOR FLAVORING KOMBUCHA (30-40 Servings - 1.0oz by weight) - Maca root has been used by indiginous Andean societies as a source of nourishment and healing for thousands of years. Studies have identified four alkaloids present in maca known to nourish the endocrine system. Maca root is a nutrient dense adaptagen that has been used to increase stamina, boost libido and combat fatigue. Also a great addition to smoothies. ***RECIPE IDEA: Cacao Pow = maca & cacao. ***FEATURES: Organic & Raw; Adds unique healing properties & flavor to your KT and smoothies; Flavors approximately 30-40 Bottles (16oz). This product ships via USPS.
